content: Dr. Salako’s meetings ended with a big thanks to everyone, laying down a very optimistic and robust growth plan for the DCC & KCC Consultants office. He also appreciated the efforts and leadership of Dr. Umair Haider, General Manager, and Noshaba Maqbool, Manager, Marketing and Communications in Pakistan.
